creator: Tom Carreras
title: DOJ Mulls Bringing Criminal Charges Against Binance: Report
dc:creator: Tom Carreras
content: Binance and its executives could be facing charges including unlicensed money transmission, money laundering conspiracy, and criminal sanctions violationsif prosecutors can agree on filing them. Reuters vs. Binance The FTX...

title: 63 people arrested by Chinese police for laundering $1.7B through crypto

creator: Trustnodes
title: Crypto is the Top Asset for Rich Millennials Says Survey
dc:creator: Trustnodes
content: Millennials choose crypto as their top assets, above stocks or private equity, according to a survey.

title: Bitcoin could reach $1M in 5 years due to fiat currenciesâ€™ collapse, says Samson Mow
dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marco Castrovilli
content: The future collapse of fiat currencies could propel Bitcoin to $1 million in the next five to 10 years, according to Jan3 CEO and Bitcoin proponent Samson Mow.
